channel.title: miljko tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from miljko.

item.description: @dgomezalmaguer ‚ÄúThe future is already here, it‚Äôs just not evenly distributed‚Äù -W. Gibson
@MelanicjMD @NCICCR_Lymphoma @theNCI Hey, congrats! Now how about that paper? :) https://t.co/nX2XJSuyDI

@GuiperiniMD This is misuse of the term ‚Äúabscopal‚Äù. How can they call a response abscopal when they are also giving systemic therapy? At best I would say that RT may be augmenting response to nivo.

PSA: don‚Äôt dig holes in the sand. A few years ago my wife and I finished a Thanksgiving beach outing by helping dig out a kid (not ours!) completely buried after a hole he was in collapsed. He made it out alive, but it was traumatic for everyone involved. https://t.co/tOe4iIWmRZ

The NYT dostarlimab article is reverberating through international media with predictable consequences: being hailed as a miracle cure for cancer. I wrote about it in Serbian, and Google‚Äôs translation of it is readable, in an AI-generated spam sort of way. https://t.co/oHen5h6dBc
https://t.co/xkwQHHZiLO
üôÑ https://t.co/golL9urVYr https://t.co/1BGCoUAK9h

Residency programs‚Äô publication requirements generate the worst kind of scientific BS ‚Äî useless case reports and rushed chart reviews that clog lit searches without creating any meaningful insight, all while wasting residents‚Äô precious time. Please stop.

‚ÄúBrilliance represents an upper bound on the quality of your reasoning, but there is no lower bound.‚Äù A frameable quote if there ever was one, from an excellent blog post on why smart people may believe dumb things. https://t.co/Hi2rKSGRRg
The bullshitization of science: https://t.co/XF2SSqtwUb
To reform NIH, maybe you should first understand it?: https://t.co/C8HiFvRRAW
Walking around Seoul: https://t.co/d5gFxiHwx0
@rubinstein_md @ManniMD1 @MediHumdani Would be nice if Twitter were the only place where we needed to think about the word count. Good thread, thanks!

@rubinstein_md @ManniMD1 @MediHumdani Do you really think either of the K-M curves need to reach the median before doing any sort of OS analysis? ‚ÄúMedian OS is not reached‚Äù and ‚ÄúThere has been no difference in OS to date‚Äù are two mutually compatible statements. I leave implications and interpretation to myeloma docs

@EricTopol @NCIEytanRuppin 12, not 18. In a tiny subset of patients with cancer. Using a class of drug already known to work well in that subset. It is great news that ICIs may be moved up before surgery and the investigators deserve kudos, but your tweet and the NYT article are needlessly sensationalistic
@ManniMD1 @MediHumdani No horse in this race, but after 7 years isn‚Äôt the ASCT curve more likely to start sloping downwards from t-MDS and other long-term tox?
@ramya_ramaswami @NCIResearchCtr @ThomasOdeny @ASCO @ConquerCancerFd @NCIGopal Congrats to you both!!! üôå
The New York Times should have its medical provider license revoked: https://t.co/YwJNQZldHM
üì∑ Nature is obviously a fan of Escher. https://t.co/7z8hW9Kk8D
üì∑ Reminds me of M.C. Escher‚Äôs Three Worlds (Tregaron Park, NW DC) https://t.co/gfeuzsXmiu

‚ÄúThe Cotswolds are like Disneyland, they said. And I suppose that was meant to be pejorative. But as a kid I grew up going to Disney World, over and over, ‚Ä¶ and having the time of my life.‚Äù I like Disney World, but it looks like I would really like ... https://t.co/AoLtaLPLbj
@trishankkarthik A most excellent show. Reading GEB now and some chapters reminded me of this scene https://t.co/QZVdvbVLnE
@zamishka @barttels2 Heh, that‚Äôs the ending of Black Mirror S1E2. Not word for word, but it rhymes.

‚ÄúMany breakthroughs in scientific progress have required massive funding and national coordination. This is not one of them. All that needs to be done is allow expert research scientists to do the hands-on work that they‚Äôve been trained to do.‚Äù Spot on. https://t.co/mk66fLKp2t
Gosh, this was a good movie. We expected flying cars and replicators, and instead the future couldn‚Äôt even muster up a good satire (Don‚Äôt Look Up is a pale copy). https://t.co/ytkGtbdnQo
@barttels2 Remember? It's on the regular re-watch list! https://t.co/SLKkkshql0
